DOC.brief_summary: This trial design investigate safety , tolerability effectiveness OSI-774 ( tarceva ) combine oxaliplatin capecitabine treat patient metastatic colorectal cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Tarceva , Capecitabine Oxaliplatin Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Patients treat OSI-774 ( orally ) daily , oxaliplatin ( intravenously ) every 3 week , capecitabine ( orally ) twice daily 14 day follow 7-day rest period . This constitute 21-day treatment cycle . Treatment continue disease progression unacceptable toxicity occur .
